project.description: Optional Lean project name; defaults to config file stem.

algorithm_path.description: Path to the algorithm file (Python or C#); defaults to monthly universe alpha.

config_path.description: Path to Lean configuration file; defaults to monthly_universe_alpha config.

parameters.description: Optional parameter dictionary passed to Lean CLI.

docker_image.description: Docker image to use when running Lean; defaults to quantconnect/lean:latest.
